title: Trying to claim an Inactive name, but it won't go through
body:
So I'm trying to claim an inactive Summoner Name. op.gg has no data for the summoner, and it was last updated over a year ago (lvl 12 as well so this falls under the inactivity rule). 

When I type the name into the screen it say's it is Available, but when it asks "Are you sure this is what you want to display in game?" I can't click yes.

Anyone have a resolution?

replies.body: Since I don't want to risk someone swiping the potential summoner name from you, and because we'll need to dive into some of our tools to look into this, I recommend reaching out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) about this. If you aren't too worried about someone copping that name, simply provide me the summoner name you're trying to grab so I can take a look.
